transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji good afternoon, Amit baat kar raha hu sir mai IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ha bolo.
Customer: Uh sir.
Executive: Kaisa chal raha hai sir IndiaMART ke sath aapka?
Customer: Kya bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Pahla hua ek mahina bana ke ek mahine se order aaya nahi. Abhi aise factory ka order aata.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Wo wo bhi chalk piece factory rehta aur humko kya bhi raha to bolo ji karke phone aata.
Executive: Ha dekhiye mai sir dekh bhi pa raha hu aapne na kuch uh wrong BL jo hai mark kare hai right?
Customer: To usme sir aap ye hai ha bo jaise jo aapke pass by lead aa raha hoga.
Executive: Wo kisi aur cheez ka aa raha hoga aur aap usme deal nahi karte right?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha to aapne box style wo jo wrong karke dikhaya wo chalk piece wo alag alag chalk piece hai. Hum regular jo normal jo regular rehta waisa chalk use karte hai hum.
Customer: Accha wo box style me aap deal nahi karte? Box style me deal nahi karte aap?
Executive: Box box style me deal nahi karte na? Nahi nahi ha wo box style nahi banate hum.
Executive: Okay ab sir abangel dikhaya hai. Ha?
Customer: Ab sir abangel bhi nahi use karte?
Executive: Nahi use karte. Hamara factory hai chalk piece factory.
Executive: Accha aapki chalk piece factory hai so isme aapne dustless chalk kar rakha tha dustless chalk to aapke pass rehti hogi na?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: To dust ab next time sir aap kabhi bhi jab bhi aap usme mark karenge na jo option aata hai delete ka option aata hai uspe tap karke fir aap mark karte hai right? To aap dust dustless chalk mark mat kijiye kyuki usse dustless chalk se kya rahega ki wo by lead nahi aayega kyuki dekhiye mai jaise check kar raha hu aapke product me dustless chalk hai thik hai?
Customer: Ha ji. Ha.
Executive: Right product me aapke dustless chalk hai but aapne dekh agar aap dustless chalk ko mark kar diya to uska lead aana band ho jayega right? Kyuki ha kyuki IndiaMART ko to yahi lagega na ki aapko iska nahi chahiye. Aapko dekhiye jiska nahi chahiye mai bata deta hu kis kis ka aapne mark kar rakha hai. Uh jo aapne mark kar rakha hai isme wo hai aapka modelling clay, box file, office file aur ab sir aapke liye ye nahi chahiye right?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ha to inko agar inki lead aati hai to mark kar dijiye aapke pass fir dustless chalk ki hi lead aayengi sir but dustless chalk ki wo to mark ho sakta hai.
Customer: Mark ho sakta hai?
Executive: Ye mark kar rakhe hai already. Ha ye already aapne mark kar rakhe hai ye IndiaMART se. Mark kiya bhai mark ye hone ke baad kya mark kare? Khali dustless chalk hi chhod denge?
Executive: Nahi nahi mai batata hu jaise koi bhi aap maan lijiye koi by lead IndiaMART open kijiye aap phone pe IndiaMART open kijiye mai batata hu kaise karna hai.
Customer: Ha karta hu.
Executive: Ha koi issue nahi isko phone ko speaker par rakh lijiye aur IndiaMART app open kijiye.

Customer: Dustless chalk.
Customer: Hyderabad, Telangana.
Executive: Ha dustless chalk isko uh isko contact pe aap tap kijiye.
Customer: Isko contact me ha. Ha open ho gayi aur number wagera show ho raha hoga aapko.
Executive: Ha ji.
Executive: Right uh back kijiye ek bar. Uh call karo? Nahi call nahi karna back kijiye.
Customer: Call kar lijiye aap fir meri jab call kar de na uske baad call karo. Ha ha thik hai thik hai. To ha ye dekho dekho dekho aap aap suno suno suno. Jaise ek minute ha ye jo order aaya 100 box 200 box kya white multi colour 3000 10000 order value ye bhi factory hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Ye ye bhi chalk piece factory hai.
Executive: Okay okay. Ha.
Executive: Thik hai dekhiye ab mera kehne dekhiye mera kehne ka matlab ye hai ki jaise ek by lead pe aap back kijiye relevant ke niche jaaiye. Ha.
Executive: To aapko na waha pe delete ek delete karke option aa raha hoga by lead ke upar ek delete karke option ban raha hoga. Likha hai na ha ha ha. Uspe tap karenge to aapko waha paanch options dikh rahe honge. Delete pe delete karo delete. Ha delete pe tap karenge to waha aapko paanch chhe paanch options aa rahe honge. Ha ha ji. Ha to ha to aap aapko ispe jab isme jab select karna hai to aapko dekh lijiye ki wo select karna hai jaise I did not deal in this specific product ya fir kuch aur select karna hai thik hai. Taki ye jo keyword hai kyuki dekhiye dustless white chalk ye keyword to aapke me aa raha hai na thik hai aapke product se to related hai na ye. Aisi aisi by lead nahi aapko ha aisi by lead delete nahi karni hai jisme aapka aapka keyword aa jayega thik hai. Kyuki wo kya hai similarity hai right? Nahi nahi.
Customer: Tumhare pass hai ab isme uh first wo kya cancel I do not deal Bengal second order value ko sa ye kare isko delete. Just remove this by lead only okay. Ye ko sa sorry. Only ha ye ye kar sakte hai aap jaise delete this by lead only because of kyu kyuki ye wali valid aapko nahi chahiye. Kyuki dekhiye agar aap isme usme ek reason de denge na to fir wo samajh lega ki like dustless chalk ki to chahiye hi nahi aur dustless chalk ki to hum chahiye to fir hum dustless me kam karte hai right?
Executive: Ha ji. Ji ji bilkul. Dusra cheez sir dekhiye isme na ek jab bhi aap by lead wale section me aayenge na to aapko kya karna hai pahli location wale pe India select karna aur bulk plus 25 dikh raha hoga aapko upar hi. Upar hi show ho raha hoga jaise uh IndiaMART ke side me log side me three three bars aa rahe honge uspe tap kijiye. Waha latest by lead me jayenge na latest by lead wale options me to waha aapko uh filter me India and bulk 25 plus likh raha hoga wo dono filter select karne ke baad by lead dekhna thik hai?
Executive: Sir samajh aaya mai kya bata raha hu aapko? Upar around Karnataka, Telangana. Hmm hmm. Ha aur India India karke aaya ha. India aane ke baad ha. India select kiya fir aapko halka sa niche likha hoga bulk B U L K bulk 25 plus. Usi row me. Ha. Wo by lead dustless white chalk five box Tamil Nadu. Tamil Nadu kaha hai ye? Hmm dekhiye mai batata hu ek minute dijiye mujhe. Jaise aapne uh ek minute dijiye. Ab ye three bars pe tap kiya latest by lead me aap hai abhi current me to waha pe all aa raha hai all me India select kiya humne aur usi uske just all ke niche hi aapko dikh raha hoga bulk 25 plus then aapne by lead check ki thik hai? Ha ji ha ji ha ji bulk 25 plus hai na hai na ha. Ji ji bilkul. Ha uspe touch kare? Ha usko select karne ke baad by lead check karne ka thik hai isse kya hai ki aapko jo bade amount ke by leads aayenge bahut jaruri honge thik hai. Ha. Okay. Okay so anything else sir like aur koi issues ke regarding? To maine bataya na aapko ha dustless chalk jaisa keyword aapko agar dikhega to wo by lead nahi mark karna thik hai next time se. Okay ji okay okay. Okay sir aur mai sir koshish karta hu ki aapke pass jyada se jyada seek by leads aaye thik hai. Thik hai. Okay thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Explained how to mark irrelevant buyleads.

- Explained how to filter buyleads by location.

- Explained how to filter buyleads by bulk.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filters, dustless chalk
